__construct()

__construct(string $icu_version)

Constructor.

Parameters

string $icu_version

The current ICU version; mostly used for testing.

Throws

\Aura\Intl\Exception\IcuVersionTooLow

when the Version of ICU installed is too low for Aura.Intl to work properly.
